Subskills.name: Astral Crush
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by asteroid.

Subskills.name: Asteroid Aftershock
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional asteroid.

Subskills.name: Wave of Asteroids
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple asteroids in a shockwave from the point of impact.

Subskills.name: Impact Speed
Subskills.description: Increases the falling speed and maximum cast range of asteroid.

Subskills.name: World Ending Impact
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of asteroid.

Subskills.name: A Gift From Space
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Clairvoyant Prophet
Subskills.description: Reduces the mana cost of asteroid.

Subskills.name: Sharp Asteroids
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

Subskills.name: Planetary Collapse
Subskills.description: Unleash a colossal asteroid causing a massive explosion unleashing a massive tsunami dealing increased damage with increased area of effect radius. Asteroid now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Frozen Core
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Coldshatter Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frostbitten targets.

Subskills.name: Perseids
Subskills.description: Chance to drop smaller asteroids at target location on hit.

Subskills.name: Geomagnetic Reversal
Subskills.description: Asteroid unleashes multiple tsunami waves in an arc towards target direction.

Subskills.name: Galactic Cataclysm
Subskills.description: Summon a continous rain of asteroids around you for a short period. Asteroid now has a cooldown.
